slide1.title: Discover the power of nutrition with Nutriota.
slide1.subtitle: We offer a range of vitamins, minerals, and supplements tailored to the different health needs of each individual.

about.title: About Nutriota
about.description1: At Nutriota, we believe life is a journey where time is precious. That's why we're dedicated to delivering high-quality, scientifically-backed supplements that help you perform at your best in every area of life.
about.description2: Discover how we're empowering thousands across the UK and Europe to unlock their full potential through nutritional excellence.

bestSellers.title: Best Sellers
bestSellers.subtitle: Discover our most popular supplements trusted by thousands of customers

lovedOnAmazon.title: Loved on Amazon
lovedOnAmazon.description: Our presence on Amazon connects us with discerning shoppers who support our products. Countless positive reviews and high ratings have earned us a reputation for excellence.

moneyBackGuarantee.title: 100% MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE
moneyBackGuarantee.description: Love it or you get our 100% money-back guarantee. We guarantee the quality, and if you're not completely satisfied, we'll refund your full price. All purchases are backed by Nutriota's lifetime guarantee.

carefullyManufactured.title: Carefully manufactured
carefullyManufactured.description: Our nutritional supplements are carefully formulated, combining research and high-quality ingredients to create effective and safe products that exceed all expectations.

learnNews.title: Learn & News
learnNews.subtitle: Discover practical wellness insights and stay updated with the latest in nutrition science

footer.tagline: Clean, transparent supplements designed for modern lifestyles. Your daily wellness, simplified.
footer.companyDescription: DZH B.V. is the official distribution partner of Nutriota in the EU.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated with Nutriota
newsletter.subtitle: Join our community and receive the latest wellness tips, health insights, and exclusive offers directly to your inbox.

news.title: Latest Health News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay up-to-date with the newest wellness tips, health discoveries, and simple ways to feel your best every day
news.discoverMore: Discover more health tips and wellness articles

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Our success starts with you in mind
hero.description: Every day we work passionately to manufacture the best nutritional supplements and use only the finest raw materials.

background.title: Background
background.subtitle: The Jumbostore Story
background.description: Jumbostore Ltd, a British company specializing in the manufacture of nutritional supplements, has a remarkable brand called Nutriota. Our products, originating from humble beginnings, have enjoyed great popularity and are now enjoyed in more than 5 countries worldwide.

dzh.title: DZH B.V. - The Distributors
dzh.description: DZH B.V., headquartered in the Netherlands, has seamlessly integrated into the global network of Jumbostore Ltd. Shortly before the UK's exit from the European Union, DZH B.V. was established with the aim of meeting the EU market's demand for products from Jumbostore Ltd., including popular brands such as Nutriota and Earthly Nutrition.
dzh.service: Our commitment to exceptional customer service remains unwavering. Whether you are a wholesaler, retailer, or private customer, our friendly team is always eager to fulfill your product wishes and answer your inquiries.

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.subtitle: Drive your journey to a healthier self
mission.paragraph1: At Nutriota, we reach out our arms to welcome the joy of life and motivate people to achieve their highest potential through the provision of high-quality and effective nutritional supplements.
mission.paragraph2: We believe in nurturing the unique abilities of each individual, and we want our nutrition to be part of their journey of discovery to the healthiest version of themselves.

wellness.title: Empowering Wellness
wellness.description: Nutriota is an emerging nutritional supplement brand that enables people to realize their potential through excellent nutrition. Our nutritional expertise ensures that we offer vitamins and minerals of the highest quality throughout the UK and Europe.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.subtitle: Pioneering nutrition for greater vitality
vision.description: We want to lead a global movement for wellness and vitality. We strive to be at the forefront of nutritional science and offer innovative, scientifically-based nutritional supplements that help people lead healthier, more active, and more balanced lives.
vision.paragraph2: We envision a world where as many people as possible have the resources and knowledge to nourish their body, mind, and soul, unfold their own potential, and achieve their personal best.

chatbot.initialMessage: Hi there! I'm Nutriota's health assistant. What supplements are you looking for, or what health goal can I help with?
chatbot.title: Nutriota's health assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Start a chat. We're here to help you 24/7.
chatbot.footer: Developed and Maintained by VIRRTECH; virrtech.com
chatbot.bubbleMessage: Hi there! I can help you find the right product

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: We are committed to protecting your personal data and ensuring compliance with global privacy regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other applicable laws. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.
privacy.informationWeCollectText: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.personalInfo: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, billing address, and payment details when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us.
privacy.usageData: Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our website, such as IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, and time spent on our services.
privacy.cookies: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We use cookies, web beacons and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and deliver personalized content.
privacy.provideServices: Provide, maintain, and improve our services and website functionality.
privacy.communicate: Communicate with you, including responding to inquiries and sending service-related updates.
privacy.personalize: Personalize your experience through tailored content and advertising.
privacy.monitor: Monitor and analyze usage patterns to improve our services.
privacy.comply: Comply with legal obligations and enforce our policies.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your privacy rights, please contact us at:
privacy.legalBasisText: For users in the European Economic Area (EEA), we process personal data based on the following legal grounds:
privacy.consentText: Where you have given explicit consent for specific purposes, such as marketing.
privacy.contractText: To fulfill our obligations under a contract, such as processing payments.
privacy.legalText: To comply with applicable laws and regulations.
privacy.legitimateText: For purposes such as improving our services or preventing fraud, where our interests do not override your rights.
privacy.infoSharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following cases:
privacy.serviceProvidersText: We share data with trusted third-party providers who assist with services such as payment processing, hosting, or analytics, under strict confidentiality agreements.
privacy.legalReqText: We may disclose information to comply with legal obligations, such as responding to court orders or government requests.
privacy.businessTransferText: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction, with appropriate safeguards.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal information, including:
privacy.encryption: Encryption of sensitive data during transmission and storage.
privacy.securityAssessments: Regular security assessments and updates to our systems.
privacy.accessControls: Access controls to limit who can view or process your data.
privacy.securityNote: Despite our efforts, no system is completely secure. In the event of a data breach, we will notify affected users as required by law.
privacy.rightsText: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.accessText: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
privacy.deletionText: Request the deletion of your data, subject to legal obligations.
privacy.restrictionText: Request that we limit the processing of your data.
privacy.portabilityText: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
privacy.objectionText: Object to processing based on legitimate interests or for direct marketing.
privacy.withdrawText: Withdraw consent at any time, where processing is based on consent.
privacy.contactRights: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details below.
privacy.internationalText: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your jurisdiction, including the United States. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable laws, using mechanisms like Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) for EEA data.
privacy.retentionText: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy or as required by law. For example, we retain account information while your account is active and for a reasonable period thereafter to comply with legal obligations.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance your experience. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Essential cookies are necessary for website functionality, while optional cookies support analytics and personalized content.
privacy.thirdPartyText: Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.
privacy.updatesText: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of significant changes via email or a prominent notice on our website.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms of use carefully before using our site

seo.title: Terms and Conditions - Nutriota
seo.description: Read our terms and conditions for using the Nutriota website and services.
seo.keywords: terms, conditions, legal, Nutriota, supplements, website

terms.introduction: Welcome to Nutriota website (our site). Please read these terms of use carefully before you start to use the site. By using our site, you indicate that you accept these terms of use and that you agree to abide by them. If you do not agree to these terms of use, please refrain from using our site.

section1.title: 1. INFORMATION ABOUT US
section1.content: Nutriota is dedicated to providing high-quality food supplements.

section2.title: 2. ACCESSING OUR SITE
section2.content: Access to our site is permitted on a temporary basis, and we reserve the right to withdraw or amend the service we provide on our site without notice. We will not be liable if for any reason our site is unavailable at any time or for any period.

section3.title: 3. ACCURACY OF INFORMATION AND DISCLAIMER
section3.content: The information on our site is intended for general informational purposes only and should not be relied upon for making any decisions regarding health or wellbeing. We strive to ensure accuracy but make no representations or warranties regarding the completeness or accuracy of the information on our site. We accept no liability for any loss or damage caused by reliance on the information on our site.

section4.title: 4. LINKS TO OTHER SITES
section4.content: We may provide links to other websites for your convenience. We are not responsible for the content of these linked sites and do not endorse or warrant their accuracy. You access these linked sites at your own risk.

section5.title: 5. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
section5.content: All intellectual property rights displayed on our site are owned by Nutriota. You may not modify, publish, transmit, or create derivative works based on the content of our site without our express permission.

section6.title: 6. SERVICE ACCESS
section6.content: While we endeavor to ensure that our site is normally available 24 hours a day, we shall not be liable if for any reason our site is unavailable at any time or for any period.

section7.title: 7. REGISTRATION
section7.content: If you wish to register on our site, you must be aged 18 or over. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your computer.

section8.title: 8. VIRUSES, HACKING, AND OTHER OFFENSES
section8.content: You must not misuse our site by knowingly introducing viruses, trojans, worms, logic bombs, or other material which is malicious or technologically harmful. You must not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our site.

section9.title: 9. ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY
section9.content: You may use our site only for lawful purposes. You may not use our site in any way that breaches any applicable law or regulation.

section10.title: 10. BARRING FROM THE SITE
section10.content: We reserve the right to bar anyone from our site, on a permanent or temporary basis at our discretion.

section11.title: 11. LEGAL JURISDICTION AND DISPUTE RESOLUTION
section11.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with English law. The courts of England shall have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute which may arise out of or in connection with these terms.

section12.title: 12. DATA PROTECTION
section12.content: We process information about you in accordance with our privacy policy. By using our site, you consent to such processing.

section13.title: 13. FURTHER INFORMATION
section13.content: For further information on these terms or any queries, please contact us via the Contact page.
